page.title: 06SHOPPING IN LODSWORTH
page.content:
Seventy years ago {Lodsworth}was a self-supporting community with eight or nine shops,a blacksmith and other craftsmen. {Cider}was made in large quantities,for the village had been famous for its apple orchards. Today there is only one General Stores combined with the Post Office in the centre of the village.
